entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The recent correspondence highlights two primary concerns about a collaborative project. Firstly, there was ambiguity surrounding the perception of time constraints potentially hindering participation. This issue appears to be resolved following a response that clarified time would not be a significant obstacle. Secondly, discussions about the suitability of Ruben and Jon for specific roles within the project were mentioned. It is evident from the feedback of others involved that there is a general consensus regarding their aptness for these positions. The communication underlines a broader discussion within the team, aiming at ensuring all members are aligned with their responsibilities and the expectations set forth for the project's success. The link provided by Ava ([gnusha.org](https://gnusha.org/pi/bitcoindev/CAO3Pvs8B+NVWFUxg6zfNXYrAfX9mhqpj9ZpNSEr4HWUbJKnNmw@mail.gmail.com/)) serves as a reference point for further details on the dialogue.
